name: respect
example_en: We should respect our elders and listen to their advice.
example_cn: 我们应该尊敬长辈并听取他们的建议。
memory_tips: 词根 'spect' 来自拉丁语，意为 '看' 或 '观察'。联想记忆：想象一个场景，你站在远处，用望远镜（spect）观察一位你非常尊敬的长者。图像记忆：画一个年轻人向一位长者鞠躬，表示尊重。

image_prompt.main_image: A young person bowing respectfully to an elderly person in a traditional setting, symbolizing respect and honor.
image_prompt.example_image: A group of students attentively listening to an elderly teacher in a classroom, illustrating the concept of respecting elders and valuing their advice.

collocations: respect others (尊重他人); self-respect (自尊); respect nature (尊重自然)
